company_info.Company Description: cmts is engaged in the data entry outsourcing and supply of skilled/semi skilled & unskilled Manpower across the industry spectrum. Our pool of manpower ranges from professionals such as Sales & technical professionals in different categories, IT professionals, aviation sector, technical profiles, engineers, non-technical in-house professionals, administrative profiles, Accountant, HR, Back office, Data Entry Operator etc. Our organization's goal is total clients satisfaction through quality and personalized delivery of each and every service. We therefore exist to cater the need of these prospecting employers/companies since our inception in 2008.

api_data.job_title: Senior Tour consultant for Travel company at Saanewal locations

jd_information.description: Urgent requirements for Senior Tour consultant for Travel company company at Saanewal locations,Post-Senior Tour consultant for Travel company at Saanewal locations- 5 Positions is open and its urgently required.We have an urgent opening for male or female candidates for a travel company NO. OF OPENINGS -5 (Domestic/international consultants/visa consultants) Minimum qualification-Graduate in any stream. Experience- Only Experienced 3-5 years. Responsibilities- • Ability to handle packages (National / International)• Knowledge about national/international vendors for tour packages.• Air Ticketing / hotel bookings• Deals with travel agents or retailers• Making online reservations• Coordinate all travel logistics/Transportation• Guide the travellers through the tour’s itinerary• Co-ordinating with clients for visa documentation and application.• Should be able to convert leads and can do chat and voice call with customers.· Be able to interact and convince corporate for make bookings through our travel agency· Cold calling and fixing meetings – field marketing Skills and competencies- • Have ability to work in team• Good communication skills in English, Hindi and local language• Personally motivated and positive Attitude• Knowledge of computer Salary -18000 -30000 per month + incentives+ OT (Negotiable).Intrested candiadtes can call to Aditya kumar on 8527750087 or mail your cv on hr@cmts.in, cmts.hr@gmail.com
